CIAttributeDescription: Increases image detail by sharpening. It operates on the luminance of the image; the chrominance of the pixels remains unaffected.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.

inputSharpness.CIAttributeDescription: The amount of sharpening to apply. Larger values are sharper.
